title: Carnival Corp CEO on Possible 2020 Cruises, Sanofi to Buy Principia for $3.4 Billion
itunes:title: Carnival Corp CEO on Possible 2020 Cruises, Sanofi to Buy Principia for $3.4 Billion
description:
Arnold Donald, CEO at Carnival Corp, discusses the possibility that cruises could resume this year but it’s too “early” to make a determination with public health restrictions still in place. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Seattle Bureau Chief Dina Bass talk about why TikTok looks like a dangerous dance move for Microsoft. Bloomberg Intelligence Senior Pharmaceutical Analyst Sam Fazeli breaks down Sanofi agreeing to acquire U.S. biotech company Principia Bipharma for about $3.4 billion as the French drugmaker pivots toward innovative therapies to spur growth. And we Drive to the Close with Lesley Marks, CIO at BMO Private Wealth Canada.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Alix Steel. Producer: Paul Brennan

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
